name: Darts Up 3D
overview: Darts Up 3D is a fun game of darts in which you will have complete control over aiming thanks to the Nintendo 3DS motion sensor. You can play with your friends and family, up to a maximum of 4 Players, using Mii characters to create your profile. Darts Up 3D has several playing modes, including the famous 501. Features of Darts Up 3D: Send the full Darts Up 3D using the "Download Play" option. 4 Players on just one Nintendo 3DS. Create your own profile using Mii characters. Use the motion sensor to aim and view the surroundings. Entirely in 3D Stereoscopic. Three playing modes, including 501!
